summary: A collection of utility functions for voice activity detection (VAD) within the NeMo ASR framework. The module handles model initialization, frame‑level VAD inference, conversion of predictions to speech/non‑speech segments, filtering short segments, loading and writing RTTM files, constructing pyannote annotation objects, preparing manifests for training/evaluation, computing detection metrics, and visualising VAD results.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to build, tune, and evaluate VAD components in speech recognition pipelines, facilitating accurate speech segmentation, dataset preparation, and performance analysis for downstream ASR applications.
